preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document is the user manual for the CUBA Platform Workflow Subsystem.

simplesect.title: Target Audience
simplesect.para: This manual is intended for developers who use the CUBA platform to create applications with business processes management functionality. It is assumed that the reader is familiar with the Developer's Manual, which is available at www.cuba-platform.com/manual.

simplesect.title: Additional Materials
simplesect.para: This manual, as well as other documentation on the CUBA platform, are available at www.cuba-platform.com/manual.

simplesect.title: Feedback
simplesect.para: If you have any suggestions for improving this manual, please contact Technical Support at www.cuba-platform.com/support/topics.
When reporting errors in the documentation, please indicate the chapter number and include a small portion of the surrounding text to make the search easier.
